name: finery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
beautiful clothing and jewellery worn on a special occasion: in your finery There we all were in our finery, waiting for the bride and groom to arrive.

Add to word list
decorative and expensive clothing and jewelry worn on a special occasion: The stars arrived for the Oscars dressed in all their finery.
